div.style: display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; flex-direction: column
display: {imageDisplay}; left: 17px; top: 16px; align-items: center; justify-content: center; position: absolute

img.style: display: flex; width: 36px; height: 36px; align-items: center

div.style: display: {labelDisplay}; top: {labelTop}px; align-items: center; justify-content: center; position: absolute; text-align: center
